name: VEGAS Movie Studio 15 Platinum Steam Edition
detailed_description:
Make each and very one of your creative ideas reality with VEGAS Movie Studio Platinum Steam Edition. Discover all the powerful tools you need for intuitive video editing combined in a single fully customizable user interface. Breathtaking effects and filters, comprehensive color correction, precise 4K and multicam editing and a wide range of additional features offer you maximum creative freedom for editing. VEGAS Movie Studio.Create. Simply.

Premium-quality videos also require perfect audio. Music Maker 2017 is included for free for creating soundtracks for your videos.

Highlights


Discover the latest features in VEGAS Movie Studio 15 Platinum Steam Edition:

  • New, flexible user interface
  • Quick start window with essential first steps
  • Simplified media import
  • Improved support for smartphone videos (including iPhone)
  • Clear Timeline with event healing
  • Customizable background color for interface
  • Customizable workspace with modern docking window
  • Professional picture-in-picture effects design
  • Faster video editing for split-screen presentations
  • Instant freeze frame function for still shots
  • HEVC support for the latest video formats
  • Improved hardware acceleration
  • Includes Music Maker 2017 for creating perfect sound for your video

Video and audio production


Innovative functions for intuitive editing
Make movie projects as big as your expectations with video editing on up to 200 video and 200 audio tracks. VEGAS Movie Studio provides you with the space you need for powerful compositing and complex image-in-image effects. Stabilize shaky videos or optimize color values using primary and secondary color correction.

Music Maker


Produce, record and mix music. It's all possible with Music Maker 2017. Create the perfect soundtrack for your video. Choose from a wide range of audio building blocks for beats, bass, melody, vocals, rap - the choice is yours. Connect your mike, USB keyboard and drum pad controllers and start your own recording. A huge range of professional effects are included for editing and mixing your music.

Share your results

As soon as you've finished editing your video, sharing is simple.Use the program wizards to quickly upload your videos and gameplays to Facebook, YouTube and Vimeo. VEGAS Movie Studio 15 Platinum Steam Edition automatically uploads your video in the best format for the platform you select. So what are you waiting for? Share your video with the world!

short_description: Create perfect image and sound for your videos. Get this premium-quality bundle with VEGAS Movie Studio Platinum and Music Maker 2017 today!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish*, Polish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Microsoft® Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Supported NVIDIA, AMD or Intel GPU
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Microsoft® Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Multicore or multiprocessor for HD or stereoscopic 3D
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Supported NVIDIA, AMD or Intel GPU
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-compatible sound card
